titulo: El Sistema del Dr. Brea y del Profesor Pluma (The System of Dr. Tarr and Professor Fether)
descripcion: Where does eccentricity end and madness begin? Poe examines the question in this hilarious satire about a French "health establishment." Under the dubious care of the mad Monsieur Maillard, the lunatics here are quite literally in charge of the asylum - they've locked the former keepers of the asylum in an underground cell. Unfortunately, they have to pretend to be sane when visitors arrive. In Spanish.
